Feedback dari AEON Kredit Kad Sambungan dari entry Kelebihan AEON Kredit Kad , tidak sangka pada hari yang sama saya menerima feedback melalui e-mail dari Customer Service AEON Kredit Kad . Inilah e-mail yang diberikan : Customer Service AEON Credit Card : Dear Sir, Thank you for your below e-mail.
With regards to the e-mail, we would like to take this opportunity to express our heartfelt thanks to you for the write-up in your blog, ( http://www.eyriqazz.com/2010/08/kelebihan-aeon-kredit-kad.html ) about our credit card features.
AEON Credit Service would like to forward our sincere appreciation for your incredible remarks in supporting us to achieve the goal, which is to provide an excellent service to all our valued customers.
Your continued patronage and suggestions are a vital part of our growth. We will forward your ideas and suggestions to our management for their consideration.
Kindly provide us your details for our future reference. We look forward to serving you for many years to come. With broad smile, once again we would like Thank You for being our valuable customer.
“Appreciation is a wonderful thing: It makes what is excellent in others belong to us as well”
Sayapun menyusul dan menghantar e-mail balas :
Hii Aeon,
Wah, quite surprise with the fast reply. Very good customer service. Really like the AEON Credit Card even i just use it less than a year. i think compare to Maybank Credit Card , overall it much more better. Just my 2 cents /more feedback:
1) I think AEON should have their own current/saving account so it will be easier for us to make a payment.Currently we have to go to AEON setiawangsa to make a payment.if we want to pay by Maybank2u or CIMB, there will be a charge incurred.
2)I really think AEON should advertise with Nuffnang as they have a lot of bloggers under their umbrella and they can provide you with better marketing @ creative marketing , in turn attracting more customers especially for bloggers and reader of the blog as more people are reading the blog nowadays.
3) More collaboration with other outlets i.e. fast food, restaurant, cinemas, and etc..
Less than an hour I received a reply back :
Dear Mr. Eyriqazz,
Thank you for providing your details. We will definitely forward your ideas and suggestions to our management for their consideration. Thank You for being our valuable customer and for choosing us as your financial guardian.
Wah, apa yang boleh saya katakan, customer servicenya memang pantas dan bagus. Memang patutpun saya suggest mereka mengiklankan di Nuffnang kerana different/creative exposure untuk produk mereka yang mungkin akan menarik lebih ramai pengguna. Sudah terbukti Nuffnang mampu untuk memberikan something different dan berkesan dalam mempromosikan produk/perkhidmatan.
P/s : Customer Service adalah salah satu cara untuk kita menilai bagus or tidak Sesebuah syarikat itu. Tepuk dada,tanya selera.
